gist.headline: Grokking the Frame
gist.blurb: We've tuned the aspect ratios for Grok video generation. No more awkward errorsâ€”just smooth, cinematic 3:2 goodness.
gist.summary: Updated the Grok video generation model to automatically convert unsupported 16:9 aspect ratios to the compatible 3:2 format.
gist.impact: Users requesting widescreen videos via Grok will now receive valid outputs instead of errors.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot acting as a film editor or director, adjusting the size of a video frame. Represents the adjustment of aspect ratios (16:9 to 3:2) to fit the model's capabilities.
